title: MusaPk
author: MusaPk
content: I have a wallet which I thought was empty for months. I just recently logged in to that wallet and find out that it has still some Bitcoins. Those Bitcoins came into wallet in early part of 2024 when price of Bitcoin was around 60 to 70k. I asked Chatgpt to tell me how much I have gained and to my delight the gain is 40% (as per chatgpt calculations). A gain of 40% in less then a year is too good. I know we can easily see such gain from CMC and other websites but experiencing this in real life has it's own Aroma.   Those who thought it's too late to buy bitcoin when it was over 50k can see how much Bitcoin has gained in less then a year.Sometimes it's blessing in disguise that we forget things we have in our custody like Bitcoins. But Bitcoin and just forget them (without losing the keys)       Only because of OpSec I am not sharing screenshot of my wallet along with other details. Hope it's not required as I want to highlight the point related to Bitcoin gain in value and advantage of forgetting the Bitcoins you have (without losing the keys).

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: It has been discussed many times that it is not too late to buy bitcoin. If someone buy bitcoin when it's price is at 90-100k range is that they should do DCA to accumulate more bitcoin and wait for next bull run. It's good that you earn profit since as you have said that you bought your bitcoin when the price of bitcoin that time is at 50-60k and if you compare the price today then it's 40k more than the price at that time.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: It is never too late to buy Bitcoin. But it also makes sense for someone who didn't accumulated yet to say that it's too late buy when they feel that the current price is quite high. We can't blame them as well for telling that but you do you. If you believe on the long term holding of Bitcoin, you'd pretty much buy at any price levels doing the same DCA strategy of MicroStrategy, they don't mind about the prices, they just put where their money is. And, you're a lucky guy, how I wish I still got some dust balances on my old wallets.

comments.author: LGD2Business
comments.body: To earn 100 times, 1000 times, yes, it's too late to buy Bitcoin. But you can still earn 3 times, 5 times in the coming years. After all, there is a saturation point and it cannot experience astronomical increases after a certain point. Bitcoin is now mainstream, Bitcoin price is given together with Dollar, Euro, Gold price in economic news. To get to this point in 16 years is a great achievement. Bitcoin will continue to be a good investment tool, but if you want your money to increase 1000 times in an instant, this is no longer possible with Bitcoin.

comments.author: red4slash
comments.body: Almost most people in this forum have the same idea that it is never too late to buy bitcoin because in any case saying it is too late to buy bitcoin is for those who are not sure about bitcoin, do not like bitcoin so that it gives fear to those who are weak in holding bitcoin and those who are indeed lay and do not study bitcoin.When we are not included in that group then in the end we will be at the same conclusion where it is never too late to buy or collect as much bitcoin as we can. This is actually a condition that always repeats itself where there are people who say that bitcoin is too expensive and too high to buy but in the end when we talk about the progress of bitcoin which is getting higher and higher in terms of value of course we know that in the end that conclusion is a mistake.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: If you say it's too late to buy bitcoin now, then wait for tomorrow when you expect the price to go down, which it won't, then you will have to wait for another tomorrow until you can only afford to buy your regret rather than Bitcoin. Those who consider bitcoin to be too expensive or too late to acquire it could have also not acquired it even if they met it when the price was at its lowest.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: It is always good to check almost all old Bitcoin wallets and to secure there private information either safe because of possible future airdrops because the crypto technology advancements are always constant. Besides, we might have a treasure in the wallet not knowing and I once lost some 200 SOL through this before.Quote from: MusaPk on January 05, 2025, 06:22:02 PM[snip] I asked Chatgpt to tell me how much I have gained and to my delight the gain is 40% (as per chatgpt calculations). A gain of 40% in less then a year is too good. I know we can easily see such gain from CMC and other websites but experiencing this in real life has it's own Aroma.   Don't tell me you're one of the people who believe every information provided by ChatGpt to an authentic information when its response is determined by the data integrated.Quote from: MusaPk on January 05, 2025, 06:22:02 PMOnly because of OpSec I am not sharing screenshot of my wallet along with other details. Hope it's not required as I want to highlight the point related to Bitcoin gain in value and advantage of forgetting the Bitcoins you have (without losing the keys).Privacy comes first on this forum and I am sure no one is interested in you sharing your wallet screenshot (specifically now that a lot of crypto enthusiasts are kidnapped for ransom in crypto) the market gain from last year's market is something everybody knows.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Best term for this by OP is, "Buy and forget"By doing this, we are prone not to sell our holdings even when the price of Bitcoin goes down a roller coaster. And in this way also we are busy with other things so we can forget to check every time the market or the price of Bitcoin which will help us not to worry or panic just incase the price of Bitcoin dumps.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: MusaPk on January 05, 2025, 06:22:02 PMI have a wallet which I thought was empty for months. I just recently logged in to that wallet and find out that it has still some Bitcoins. Those Bitcoins came into wallet in early part of 2024 when price of Bitcoin was around 60 to 70k. I asked Chatgpt to tell me how much I have gained and to my delight the gain is 40% (as per chatgpt calculations). A gain of 40% in less then a year is too good. I know we can easily see such gain from CMC and other websites but experiencing this in real life has it's own Aroma.   Those who thought it's too late to buy bitcoin when it was over 50k can see how much Bitcoin has gained in less then a year.Sometimes it's blessing in disguise that we forget things we have in our custody like Bitcoins. But Bitcoin and just forget them (without losing the keys)       Only because of OpSec I am not sharing screenshot of my wallet along with other details. Hope it's not required as I want to highlight the point related to Bitcoin gain in value and advantage of forgetting the Bitcoins you have (without losing the keys).They are always come up with that conclusion since they think Bitcoin is expensive when they look at the current price of this coin. They didn't consider the future developments and other contributing factors that can help Bitcoin price to grow. This is the reason on why we can always see people regret not to buy Bitcoin while the price is at $50k or any figures that they think expensive before but cheap right now when the price pump especially @$100k+ ATH reached.Sometimes its really a blessing in disguise when you forget about your BTC in your old wallets and you will just get surprised when you accidentally found it and gain a lot for many many months of years sleeping also when Bitcoin price goes up for more than what we expect.

comments.author: Miles2006
comments.body: Bitcoin has not gotten to the main spot yet like I always say this about early investors including myself, the encouragement alone seems satisfying while as for those who read blogs about crypto they easily get fooled with most prediction indicating when to buy. I read a news concerning the bull market surprising the news state buying bitcoin now might be considered risky, no doubt but for those who want quick profit nothing else. As for many who understands bitcoin price not just the price including a long term investment plan will benefit, well I might consider all this as a result of ignorance.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: MusaPk on January 05, 2025, 06:22:02 PMThose who thought it's too late to buy bitcoin when it was over 50k can see how much Bitcoin has gained in less then a year.For some people it's always going to be the same thing as they'll continue saying that it's too late to buy Bitcoin, blah blah, but the ones who are into Bitcoin understand that it's never too late to begin investing in Bitcoin. When you understand DCA and dip buying then each time you'll gain profit from Bitcoin investment, and when still it goes down then HODL it and see the miracle of profit taking place.

comments.author: Futurexxx
comments.body: Quote from: MusaPk on January 05, 2025, 06:22:02 PMI have a wallet which I thought was empty for months. I just recently logged in to that wallet and find out that it has still some Bitcoins. Those Bitcoins came into wallet in early part of 2024 when price of Bitcoin was around 60 to 70k. I asked Chatgpt to tell me how much I have gained and to my delight the gain is 40% (as per chatgpt calculations). A gain of 40% in less then a year is too good. I know we can easily see such gain from CMC and other websites but experiencing this in real life has it's own Aroma.   Those who thought it's too late to buy bitcoin when it was over 50k can see how much Bitcoin has gained in less then a year.One thing most investors don't know is that Bitcoin is an asset that appreciate in value overtime, and it's seriously on the rise, apart from that we are still in the early days of it, so in like 10 years time from now, I think it's fair to say that Bitcoin can go above 500k in value, so now is the best time to buy it, because it's still very cheap comparing to how much it might rise up to in the future.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Those who say it's too late to buy Bitcoin lack belief in Bitcoin's potential and still fail to see the value of long-term holding. Perhaps they were also among those who sold their holdings early when last year's bull run started due to low patience or being slow hands and now they haven't bought back because they kept waiting for the price to drop while it continues to rise. It's possible they are also unfamiliar with DCA or simply have a short-term perspective. For me you can buy Bitcoin at any time depending on your purpose, how you gonna use or spend it.

comments.author: finaleshot2016
comments.body: Well, it’s always never too late to buy bitcoin, we already said that in the past but look we are. BTC’s potential growth is still moving, the possibilities are increasing so that’s why it woll never be too late to buy BTC pr cryptocurrency in general. If you lack knowledge about the technology behind bitcoin then I’m sure you won’t rosk a single penny on BTC but if you really believe what BTC can do, you know we’ve just started and BTC can grow more.

comments.author: romero121
comments.body: Quote from: LGD2Business on January 05, 2025, 09:19:01 PMTo earn 100 times, 1000 times, yes, it's too late to buy Bitcoin. But you can still earn 3 times, 5 times in the coming years. After all, there is a saturation point and it cannot experience astronomical increases after a certain point. Bitcoin is now mainstream, Bitcoin price is given together with Dollar, Euro, Gold price in economic news. To get to this point in 16 years is a great achievement. Bitcoin will continue to be a good investment tool, but if you want your money to increase 1000 times in an instant, this is no longer possible with Bitcoin.If our expectations were limited, then it isn't too late to buy. As said, the market price will gradually move, and there'll be saturation at some point. Beyond which the growth could be really hard. I'm not sure of it, but there are predictions coming out that bitcoin will reach one million and so on. Only time can give the answer. The limited supply is stated as the major reason for the growth for the future. Different countries and corporate networks getting into the accumulation of bitcoin is a reason for the future growth. At the same time, things can go centralized when a certain group of ventures holds a major portion of the mined coins. Right now it is not late for people who think of multiplying through DCA. Also, it has turned out to be a rich person's investment, though it can be invested with very few dollars.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: MusaPk on January 05, 2025, 06:22:02 PMI have a wallet which I thought was empty for months. I just recently logged in to that wallet and find out that it has still some Bitcoins. Those Bitcoins came into wallet in early part of 2024 when price of Bitcoin was around 60 to 70k. I asked Chatgpt to tell me how much I have gained and to my delight the gain is 40% (as per chatgpt calculations). A gain of 40% in less then a year is too good. I know we can easily see such gain from CMC and other websites but experiencing this in real life has it's own Aroma.   Maybe I'll sound offline, but I still have to...Let's ignore the essence of the discussion of whether it is too late to invest in Bitcoin and whether Bitcoin is not exclusively an investment instrument but also a means of payment. Who else has to ask Chatgpt to calculate the current profit for a specific investment? Why is Chatgpt considered to be part of real life?

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: This particular thought is what so many Bitcoin enthusiast that are having this procrastinating nature is always found of doing because if you really want to get Bitcoin or join in the train of Bitcoin investment then thinking that the price would go back to where it favour is just signs that you don't know and you don't want learn about Bitcoin because this particular type of feeling is what many people that finally failed in possessing Bitcoin have been getting since. Something I have learnt from life about investment, just learn about the asset you want to invest and remover every thought of the investment favor and take an action step and don't delay cause it's very dangerous to delay.

comments.author: Japinat
comments.body: Those who says it’s too late to buy bitcoin are most likely those who fear of risking their money in bitcoin. In short, they don’t trust bitcoin. But for those who have seen the high potentials of bitcoin from the beginning up to the recent, there won’t be any late moment to invest in bitcoin, only late realizations wishing they have invested in bitcoin earlier.

comments.author: mirakal
comments.body: If you are expecting a profit after a week or a month from the time you invested, I would say you’re late investing in bitcoin right now. But if you are here for long term investment, whether you invest today or tomorrow, as long as you are certain with your decision, then I would say it will never be late for bitcoin investment.Reality is, if you really want to invest, regardless of its current price, you will find a way to invest. But if you have doubts and hesitations, you will always have reasons why investing now isn’t the best option.

comments.author: milewilda
comments.body: Quote from: MusaPk on January 05, 2025, 06:22:02 PMI have a wallet which I thought was empty for months. I just recently logged in to that wallet and find out that it has still some Bitcoins. Those Bitcoins came into wallet in early part of 2024 when price of Bitcoin was around 60 to 70k. I asked Chatgpt to tell me how much I have gained and to my delight the gain is 40% (as per chatgpt calculations). A gain of 40% in less then a year is too good. I know we can easily see such gain from CMC and other websites but experiencing this in real life has it's own Aroma.   Those who thought it's too late to buy bitcoin when it was over 50k can see how much Bitcoin has gained in less then a year.Sometimes it's blessing in disguise that we forget things we have in our custody like Bitcoins. But Bitcoin and just forget them (without losing the keys)       Only because of OpSec I am not sharing screenshot of my wallet along with other details. Hope it's not required as I want to highlight the point related to Bitcoin gain in value and advantage of forgetting the Bitcoins you have (without losing the keys).If you are really that holding up Bitcoin for long term aspect then you wont really be that worrying too much on whats the price that you would really be entering on which only into those people who do make out some short term trading are the ones who will really be that mindful when it comes into the actions that they are taking on which they will really be that wanting to have that cheapest entry as much as possible on which it will really be that normal to have this kind of approach and thats why on the time or moment that they will really be having that kind of consideration then this is the moment that you would really be wanting to get in then you do really want for a cheaper price on which it isnt bad also. If you are really that wanting to accumulate as much as you could then holding will be your other option on which this is indeed less stress since you wont really be needing something but to hold up your position and just simply buy according into your available money. The key on here is that you should really that invest into the amount that you can afford to lose,so that you wont really be ending up on having that kind of impulsive reactions at the moment or time that the market do make out it price swings on which not all will really be able to handle it out. So it will really be that situation on this aspect because each person will be having its own approach and actions that will be taken into.
